name: cp20231115-attrGroup
signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID="Context1"  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2023-11-15 20:23:11"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <Qualifiers>
    <Qualifier ID="en-US">
      <DimensionPointLink DimensionPointID="en-US"/>
    </Qualifier>
  </Qualifiers>

  <AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeGroup ID="ProductSpecifications" ShowInWorkbench="true" ManuallySorted="false" ParentID="Attribute group root">
    <Name QualifierID="en-US">Product Specifications</Name>
    <MetaData>
      <Value ID="20" AttributeID="AttributeGroupSection">Product Details</Value>
      <Value AttributeID="DisplaySequence">3</Value>
    </MetaData>
  </AttributeGroup>
  </AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeList>

    <Attribute ID="Color" MultiValued="true" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" HierarchicalFiltering="true" ClassificationHierarchicalFiltering="false" Mandatory="true">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Color</Name>
      <ListOfValueLink ListOfValueID="ColorLOV"/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="DescriptionAttributes"/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ProductSpecifications"/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="AttributeGroup"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Material" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Material</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ProductSpecifications"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Capacity" MultiValued="false" DefaultUnitID="unece.unit.QT" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Capacity</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="number" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="" InputMask="">
        <UnitLink UnitID="unece.unit.QT"/>
        <UnitLink UnitID="unece.unit.PT"/>
        <UnitLink UnitID="unece.unit.GLL"/>
        <UnitLink UnitID="unece.unit.LTR"/>
        <UnitLink UnitID="unece.unit.MLT"/>
        <UnitLink UnitID="unece.unit.CLT"/>
        <UnitLink UnitID="unece.unit.OZA"/>
      </Validation>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ProductSpecifications"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Dimensions" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Dimensions</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ProductSpecifications"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

  </AttributeList>

  <BusinessRules>
    <BusinessRule ID="CreateProducts" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
//var children = node.getChildren();
var iMax = 104;
for (var i=0; i<iMax; i++) {
	node.createProduct("","Item");
	iCurrent = i + 1;
	log.info("Created product " + iCurrent + " of " + iMax);
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">CreateProducts</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="false">
        <ValidObjectType ID="Tree"/>
      </ValidObjectTypes>
    </BusinessRule>
  </BusinessRules>
</STEP-ProductInformation>
